# Modules & Components

The Vindicta Platform is composed of several modular repositories.

## Core Modules

- **[Vindicta Core](Vindicta-Core/docs/index.md)**: Shared primitives, models, and settings.
- **[Vindicta API](Vindicta-API/docs/index.md)**: FastAPI backend services.
- **[Vindicta CLI](Vindicta-CLI/docs/index.md)**: Unified command-line interface.
- **[Vindicta Portal](Vindicta-Portal/docs/index.md)**: Web frontend.

## Components

- **[WarScribe Core](WARScribe-Core/docs/index.md)**: Action notation engine.
